view

Enum SoundEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<SoundEffect>
      • view.SoundEffect
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<SoundEffect>

    public enum SoundEffect
extends java.lang.Enum<SoundEffect>
    This enum encapsulates all the sound effects of the game, so as to separate the sound playing codes from the game codes. 1. Define all sound effect names and the associated wave file and volume (for a "3D effect"). 2. Optionally invoke the static method SoundEffect.init() to pre-load all the sound files, so that the play is not paused while loading the file for the first time. 3. The static variable SoundEffect.musicOn can be used to mute the sound. N.B.: A Java Sound based Clip uses it's own (daemon) Thread.

      8-bit game's theme.
      HIT
      Enemy hit sound.
      NEXT_LEVEL
      Level completed sound.
      SELECT
      Button selection sound.
      THEME
      Bomberman's theme.
